dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDaoDb

    public interface CustomerDAO
    This is an interface of The system customer DAO (Data Access Objects) layer, which contains basic CRUD methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void create(Customer customer)
      Creates new customer in the database (db)

      Gets the customer object from db by its name

      Gets all coupons of specific customer by its id

      Login to the system by customer user name & password

      Removes customer from the db

      Updates customer in the db

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws CouponSystemException
        Login to the system by customer user name & password
        Parameters:
        name - username of the customer
        password - password of the customer
        Returns:
        true (if login succeeded) or false (if login failed)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException
